main event: Pilots of a T-33 observed a bright object close to the horizon for about 30 seconds on February 28, 1958.
interesting points: The object appeared to grow larger and then smaller before disappearing., The sighting directed toward the USSR., A previous report of a similar nature was noted., The reliability of the observer was somewhat questioned., Conclusions included possibilities like balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
location: Northeast Cape, St. Lawrence Island, Alaska
